name: Weight of Words
description:
The world is foggy, your reason is a little dubious at times, yet you keep going. You are searching for what is yours. What was taken from you, what was forgotten, what you deserve, what you think you deserve. It's out there for you to find. 

An immersive narrative game centered around discovering memories! Made in twine, this game is currently still in development. 

This game is my take on recovering from trauma, dealing with dissociation, and receiving and recovering memories that don't feel like yours.
